name: Snakeoban (TeamDoodz)
description:
Snakeoban is a mix of the classic Snake and Sokoban games made for the BenBonk Game Jam #2.

The theme was "Limited Space".

In Snakeoban, your player controls similarly to the snake game, not being able to traverse the same path twice. Your goal? Quite like in Sokoban, to push boxes onto buttons.

Also, you can press 'R' to restart.
